property.name: Home Site
property.value: Any non-"Dragon's lair" Ruins and Lairs in a Wilderness

property.name: Special
property.value: If one of your companies is at this site, all attacks against it are canceled.

property.name: Special
property.value: Only Radagast's companies may use this card. This site is a protected Wizardhaven. If one of your companies is at this site, all attacks against it are canceled. You receive the stage point if any of your companies are at this site.

property.name: Special
property.value: If one of your companies is at this site, all attacks against it are canceled.
